Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20198492] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli(MIC=3.8 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=45.0 μM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis(MIC=0.8 μM), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=7.7 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20198492]  LC50=82μM against rat red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Exhibits potent antimicrobial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria as well as noticeable hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides from the venom of the eusocial bee Halictus sexcinctus (Hymenoptera Halictidae) and their analogs.
Literature.Author: Monincová L, Budesínskμ M, Slaninová J, Hovorka O, Cvacka J, Voburka Z, Fucík V, Borovicková L, Bednárová L, Straka J, Cerovskμ V.
